description: Asgard archaea, a group of single-celled organisms, may hold clues to the evolution of eukaryotic cells. Researchers at ETH Zurich have identified cytoskeletal proteins similar to those in eukaryotes, challenging the traditional three-domain model of life. Their findings suggest these microbes might have enabled key interactions that led to complex life
title: Asgard Archaea May Hold the Key to the Origins of Eukaryotic Life, New Study Suggests

description: The US Space Force has raised concerns over China’s advanced space warfare system, ‘Kill Mesh,’ which poses significant threats to US satellites. Speaking at the McAleese Defense Programs Conference, General Michael Guetlein emphasized the need for stronger space defenses as adversaries like China and Russia demonstrate new orbital military capabilities, including satellite grappling and electronic warfare. The Space Force is responding with enhanced infrastructure and the ‘Golden Dome’ initiative to integrate defense technologies and counter emerging threats
title: China’s ‘Kill Mesh’ Threatens US Satellites, Space Force Warns

description: Den of Thieves 2: Pantera, the sequel to the 2018 heist thriller, lands on Lionsgate Play on March 28. Directed by Christian Gudegast, the film follows Donnie Wilson as he joins a European gang for a high-stakes diamond heist. Gerard Butler reprises his role as Nick O’Brien, leading an intense pursuit across Europe. With gripping action and unexpected twists, the film explores crime and deception in the underworld. After a theatrical release in January, the film now reaches streaming audiences, offering a thrilling watch on Lionsgate Play.
title: Den of Thieves 2: Pantera OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Scientists in Japan have developed a new type of "universal memory" that could revolutionise computing. Their improved MRAM technology overcomes previous energy limitations by using a multiferroic heterostructure with a vanadium layer for stability. This allows for faster data processing while significantly reducing power consumption, making future computing devices more efficient and durable
title: Japan’s Universal Memory Breakthrough Reduces Energy, Boosts Speed

description: Mars’ water history remains a mystery as new research questions the claim that vast amounts of water are stored beneath its surface. A study led by Bruce Jakosky argues that previous estimates of Mars’ mid-crust being saturated with liquid water may be inaccurate. The findings challenge earlier interpretations of seismic data from NASA’s InSight mission, suggesting that Mars’ subsurface may contain ice or empty pore spaces instead. Future missions will be crucial in determining the true extent of water beneath the Red Planet’s surface
title: New Study Challenges Claims of Vast Underground Water on Mars

description: The Tamil comedy-drama Ring Ring, starring Praveen Raj, is arriving on Aha Tamil for its digital premiere on March 21, 2025. Directed by Shakthivel, the film follows a group of friends whose game night takes an unexpected turn when personal secrets come to light. The movie, which received mixed reviews in theatres, is now ready to reach a wider audience through streaming. Featuring Vivek Prasanna, Sakshi Agarwal, and Daniel Annie Pope, the film offers an engaging mix of drama, humour, and twists.
title: Ring Ring Ring Now Streaming: Where to Watch Praveen Raj’s Tamil Comedy-Drama Online

description: Robinhood, a Telugu heist comedy starring Nithiin and Sreeleela, is set to hit cinemas on March 28. The film follows a thief who takes on an unexpected role as a protector. Directed by Venky Kudumula and produced under Mythri Movie Makers, the film has locked its OTT deal with Zee5. It will also have its world television premiere on Zee Telugu. The official digital release date is yet to be announced, but updates will follow after its box office run.
title: Robinhood OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Nithiin’s Heist Comedy

description: SpaceX’s Falcon 9 launched the classified NROL-57 mission from Vandenberg Space Force Base, marking the shortest turnaround between launches for a reused booster at just over nine days. The first stage had previously carried NASA’s SPHEREx and PUNCH probes. This mission is part of the National Reconnaissance Office’s proliferated architecture, which aims to enhance space-based intelligence capabilities with smaller, resilient satellites. The rocket’s first stage landed back at Vandenberg, further demonstrating SpaceX’s advancements in reusability.
title: SpaceX Sets Falcon 9 Reuse Record with NROL-57 Launch from Vandenberg

description: A study has revealed that grey seals can monitor their blood oxygen levels to determine when they need to surface for air. Researchers tested seals in controlled environments, exposing them to different oxygen and carbon dioxide levels. The findings confirmed that higher oxygen led to longer dives, while reduced oxygen shortened them. Surprisingly, increased carbon dioxide had no effect on dive times. Experts believe this discovery provides new insights into marine mammal physiology and could help understand how deep-diving species regulate their breathing.
title: Study Finds grey Seals Can Track Blood Oxygen to Prevent Drowning

description: Tomb Raider developer Crystal Dynamics has announced layoffs, calling the move “necessary” for its future success. As many as 17 staff members will be let go as part of the layoffs. The studio, currently working on the next Tomb Raider title, said the job cuts would not affect its plans for its current projects.
title: Tomb Raider Developer Crystal Dynamics Announces Layoffs

description: Developers often announce free airdrops of their native tokens through social media to advertise their upcoming projects among investors. While the tactic does have a community-building aspect to it, crypto airdrop has also emerged as a repeated technique used by scammers to steal from unsuspecting individuals.
title: Understanding Crypto Airdrops: The Process, Pros and Problems

description: This week in Parliament, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman stated that encrypted communication channels are being misused for financial crimes like money laundering and tax evasion. She revealed that authorities were able to seize over Rs. 90 crores in crypto assets from a syndicate thanks to access to WhatsApp messages.
title: FM Claims Access to WhatsApp Messages Led to Seizure of Crypto Worth Rs. 90 Crore

description: iQOO Z10 is all set to go official next month. While we wait for the formal reveal, the Vivo sub-brand is posting new teasers confirming key specifications of the iQOO Z10. The latest teasers confirm the charging capability and display details of the phone. It is already confirmed to ship a massive 7,300mAh battery. Additionally, a new leak has suggested the India pricing of the iQOO Z10. iQOO is tipped to unveil the iQOO Z10x model alongside the iQOO Z10.
title: iQOO Z10 Price in India Tipped; Charging Speed, Display Brightness Officially Teased

description: Nvidia announced the release of Project G-Assist on Tuesday. The new feature is an artificial intelligence (AI) assistant that runs locally on GeForce RTX GPU-powered desktop PCs. The current release is an experimental version of the chatbot, and it does not support RTX GPU-powered laptops. Focused on gaming, the AI assistant can control a wide range of PC settings.
title: Nvidia Releases Project G-Assist AI Gaming Assistant That Runs on GeForce RTX GPUs

description: Google Workspace's March feature drop was announced on Thursday, and it is bringing several new artificial intelligence (AI) features to users. Most of these features have already been rolled out to eligible users, and others will get it in the next few days. The most notable feature is an upgrade to Google Meet’s “take notes for me” feature.
title: Google Workspace March Feature Drop to Upgrade Google Meet and Vids With New Capabilities

description: Microsoft introduced two new artificial intelligence (AI) agents to its 365 Copilot suite of features on Tuesday. These new AI agents are aimed at its enterprise users and can perform complex research and data analysis-related tasks. Dubbed Researcher and Analyst, these are built on OpenAI’s models with fine-tuning done by the Redmond-based tech giant.
title: Microsoft Introduces Two New Reasoning Agents in 365 Copilot, Launches Autonomous Agents in Copilot Studio

description: Motorola Edge 60 Pro is rumoured to be in development and images of the purported smartphone have surfaced which give a glimpse of its design from all sides. According to a report, the phone will be equipped with an additional new button beneath the volume rockers which may offer extra functionality.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro's Leaked Images Reportedly Hint Towards Inclusion of a New Button

description: Alibaba’s Qwen team released a new artificial intelligence (AI) model in the Qwen 2.5 family on Wednesday. Dubbed Qwen 2.5 Omni, it is a flagship-tier end-to-end multimodal model. The company claims it can process a wide range of inputs, including text, images, audio, and videos, while generating real-time text and natural speech responses.
title: Alibaba Qwen 2.5 Omni AI Model With Real-Time Speech Generation Released

description: Apple is promoting Vanessa Trigub to a new role as vice president of stores and retail operations globally. That executive, a longtime Apple veteran, returned last year to a role handling both retail and human-resource operations.
title: Apple Appoints Global Head for Its Retail Stores in Latest Management Shift

description: Apple's modern-day iPhone SE gets a new name, an updated design, a brand-new chipset, and a first-of-its-kind modem. While these updates may seem significant, remember that this device essentially serves as a replacement for the iPhone SE, and ultimately, your decision to purchase one hinges on its price.
title: Apple iPhone 16e Review: When You Just Need an iPhone

description: Canon PowerShot V1 and EOS R50 V were launched on Wednesday. The new cameras are aimed at fulfilling the needs of video creators, helping them enhance their visual storytelling. Canon says the PowerShot V1 is a lightweight and compact point-and-shoot camera equipped with a redesigned grip for normal and selfie shooting.
title: Canon PowerShot V1 and EOS R50 V for Video Creators Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Google Play has restricted access to 17 foreign crypto exchanges in South Korea, including KuCoin, in compliance with a regulatory directive. These exchanges can no longer be installed on Android devices within the country. The move aligns with South Korea’s efforts to regulate the digital asset market and enforce compliance among overseas platforms.
title: Google Play Store Blocks 17 Unregistered Crypto Exchanges in South Korea, Apple May Follow

description: Infinix Note 50X 5G was launched in India on Thursday as the latest Note-series offering from the Transsion Holdings subsidiary. The new 5G handset runs on the MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultimate chipset with up to 8GB RAM. The Infinix Note 50X 5G ships with an XOS 15 interface based on Android 15 and has a 6.67-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate. It houses a 5,500mAh battery with 45W fast charging support.
title: Infinix Note 50X 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultimate Chipset Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: With Apple struggling to deliver Apple Intelligence features on time, the company now seems to have moved its efforts on delivering a much-awaited visual overhaul for its iOS operating system. Keeping things exciting till September this year will also be some new designs for its Pro models which are said to have rear panels made of metal and glass. And now, there’s information about 8K video recording making it to the feature list as well.
title: iPhone 17 Series to Reportedly Get 8K Video Recording Support

description: Nothing Phone 3a and 3a Pro, launched by Carl Pei's UK-based firm, feature an Essential key linked to the Essential Space app. This app provides AI-powered functionalities like Camera Capture, now rolling out. A report hints at the possible introduction of a subscription model for accessing some Essential Space features in the future.
title: Nothing Could Introduce Subscription Model for Essential Space Features on Nothing Phone 3a Series: Report

description: OpenAI is close to finalising a $40 billion (roughly Rs. 3,43,265 crore) funding round. SoftBank will be leading this investment.
title: OpenAI Close to Finalising $40 Billion SoftBank-Led Funding

description: Poco F7 Ultra was launched in select global markets on Thursday alongside the Poco F7 Pro. The new Poco F7 series smartphones flaunts a 6.67-inch WQHD+ display with up to 3200 nits of peak brightness. The Poco F7 Pro runs on Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC, while the Ultra version has a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset under the hood. The Poco F7 Ultra has a 5,300mAh battery, whereas the Poco F7 Pro carries a 6,000mAh battery unit.
title: Poco F7 Ultra With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC Launched Alongside Poco F7 Pro: Price, Specifications

description: The PlayStation Plus monthly games lineup for April has been revealed, with Nacon’s cyberpunk shooter RoboCop: Rogue City leading the slate of titles joining the service next month. Other games joining PS Plus in April include survival-horror title The Texas Chain Saw Massacre and Bandai Namco’s RPG Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth – Hacker's Memory.
title: PS Plus Monthly Games for April Announced: RoboCop: Rogue City, The Texas Chain Saw Massacre and Digimon Story

description: Samsung recently unveiled the Flex Gaming Console, a concept foldable gaming device, at MWC 2025, and a new design patent has revealed another foldable concept: a handheld gaming console with an extendable display that transforms into a larger screen.
title: Samsung Handheld Gaming Device With Foldable Display Spotted in Design Patent

description: With the recently launched Galaxy A56, Galaxy A36, and Galaxy A26, Samsung is planning to reach the magical number of 100 million this year. In an exclusive conversation with Gadgets360, Akshay Rao, General Manager, MX Business at Samsung India, revealed that the brand is hopeful that the new series will provide a good value-for-money proposition to the customers and will further solidify its position in the different price segments.
title: Samsung will Cross 100 Million Mark with New Galaxy A-Series: Akshay Rao, General Manager, MX Business at Samsung India

description: The Witcher 4, the next entry in CD Projekt Red’s acclaimed action-RPG series, might not release until 2027 at the earliest, the studio said at its earnings call on Tuesday. The Polish developer does not expect the game to be released by the end of next year.
title: The Witcher 4 Will Not Release Before 2027, CD Projekt Red Says

description: Vivo Y39 5G was launched in India on Thursday. The phone becomes the latest addition to the company's Y series lineup and is powered by Qualcomm's 4nm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor, paired with up to 256GB inbuilt storage. It gets an IP54 rating against dust and water ingress while the company claims it has also passed environmental tests, helping it achieve Military Grade Resistance and SGS certification. The Vivo Y39 5G gets a 50-megapixel Sony HD rear camera, coupled with an AI Night Mode feature.
title: Vivo Y39 5G With Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC and 6,500mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Google is modifying its approach to developing the Android operating system (OS) for better efficiency, according to a report. Future Android development will shift from the existing AOSP public branch to Google's internal branch. However, Google will still release source code for new Android versions, which should mean custom ROM creators and platform developers are not impacted by the change.
title: Google's Android OS Will Reportedly Be Developed Privately as Company Shifts Strategy

description: Instagram is pulling back a feature from its app which was initially aimed at making the platform a more “fun and social” experience. Content Notes, introduced less than a year ago, lets users add notes to individual posts, photo carousels, and Reels which are only visible for a limited time and only to others followed by the uploader.
title: Instagram Pulls Back Content Notes Feature for Posts and Reels Due to Low Adoption

description: OpenAI added image generation capability to its existing GPT-4o artificial intelligence (AI) model on Tuesday. The San Francisco-based AI firm released the 4o Image Generation model and integrated it into the GPT-4o. The company said that the focus of this image generator is on usefulness instead of decorativeness. It comes with accurate text rendering, high prompt adherence, and character consistency.
title: OpenAI Adds Image Generation Capability to GPT-4o, Can Render Text and Offers Prompt-Based Editing

description: Alleged marketing renders of the Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge have surfaced on the Web. The newly leaked renders show the Galaxy S25 Edge in three colour options and suggest a Titanium frame. It is expected to be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy SoC alongside 12GB of RAM. The phone is anticipated to be just 5.84mm in thickness.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Official-Looking Renders Show Off Design, Three Colourways

description: Motorola Razr 60 is said to be in the works as the latest entrant in the company's Razr series. The launch date for the phone is not official yet, but it has reportedly been spotted on the TENAA website. The listing suggests the model number, design and a few specifications of the upcoming handset. The Motorola Razr 60 is listed with a 3.6-inch cover display and a 6.9-inch main screen.
title: Motorola Razr 60 Allegedly Spotted on TENAA With Up to 1TB Storage and 18GB RAM

description: Bharti Airtel on Wednesday announced the launch of its Internet Protocol Television (IPTV) services in India. It provides customers with an extensive library of on-demand content from 29 OTT streaming apps such as Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV+, Netflix, ZEE5 and many more with select plans.
title: Airtel IPTV Services With Netflix and Bundled OTT Apps Launched in India: Price, Benefits

description: Qualcomm is rumoured to debut the successor to its flagship Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset this year. The successor to this purported chip, dubbed Snapdragon 8 Elite 3, could be fabricated on a 2nm process, according to claims by a tipster. The improved lithography is said to be implemented not only for Qualcomm’s flagship 2026 SoC but for another variant too.
title: Qualcomm Said to Launch Snapdragon Chipsets Based on 2nm Node Next Year Alongside Apple
